TextView.android:text: A clock is an instrument to measure, keep, and indicate time. The word clock is derived (via Dutch, Northern French, and Medieval Latin) from the Celtic words clagan and clocca meaning 'bell'. A silent instrument missing such a striking mechanism has traditionally been known as a timepiece. In general usage today a 'clock' refers to any device for measuring and displaying the time. Watches and other timepieces that can be carried on one's person are often distinguished from clocks.
